Text: Analyst ProgramDear Mr Hayslett It was a great pleasure meeting with you Monday night I really enjoyed hearing about Enron It really gave me a better understanding of Enron and the businesses Enron is involved in Also I now know the type of candidates that you are seeking and the opportunities that exist there for me As a result my interest in working for Enron were strengthened opportunity is exactly what I have been looking for something challenging and fastpaced I am confident that my background and experience will allow me to be a great asset to Enron in various capacities I am attaching a copy of my resume and I sincerely hope that I have the opportunity to prove this to you I hope I am the type of person you are looking for as well I look forward to hearing from you soon Thanks Sejal Patel
